job description:
• *Business Line** Environment
  • *Position Title** Project Scientist III
United States of America - Indiana

Indianapolis
  • *Job Summary**
AECOM is actively seeking a highly talented and motivated Project Scientist III - Asbestos Program for immediate employment in our Indianapolis, IN office. The Project Scientist will be part of our Asbestos, lead & mold program which includes inspection, design/plan, and abatement oversight.

The responsibilities of this position include, but are not limited to:

+ Prepares reports and other technical documents

+ Compiles, evaluates, and analyzes environmental data

+ Conducts asbestos surveys

+ Conducts lead paint inspections

+ Conducts mold / indoor air quality surveys

+ Conducts universal and general hazard inventories surveys

+ Candidate will travel within a geographic territory conducting inspections (IN, IL, OH and KY)
  • *Minimum Requirements**
+ Bachelor's degree

+ 5+ years of experience

+ Asbestos Certifications (Inspector, Project Monitor, NIOSH 582, Supervisor and Designer)

+ Lead Paint Inspections

+ Indoor Air Quality Inspections

+ Excellent communication skills

+ Strong understanding of structural building components

+ Proficient with technology

+ Candidate must be self-motivated and able to work with little supervision

+ Ability to travel up 75% of the time

+ This position will require travel to multiple client sites within IN, IL, OH and KY

+ Due to the nature of the industry, there are times when weekend and evening work will be required, potentially on short notice

+ This is a fast paced position and the candidate must be flexible with schedules and able to adapt quickly

+ Due to the nature of this work, U.S. citizenship is required
  • *Preferred Qualifications**
+ DOT and RCRA Training

+ Proficient with MS Word, Excel, and Adobe

+ Experience working in SharePoint platform

+ Aerial Lift Experience
  • *What We Offer**
AECOM is a place where you can put your innovative thinking and business skills into high gear and work alongside other highly intelligent and motivated people. It's a place where you can apply your skills to some of the world's most challenging, interesting, and meaningful projects worldwide. It's a place that values the diversity of our areas of practice and our people. It's what makes AECOM a great place to work and grow. AECOM is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
